Light worms through this violet shard, as if somehow it contained the very essence of lightning.

Wondrous Item: Rare

Properties:

  • Your origin changes to elemental.
  • You can benefit from only one primordial shard at a time. If you carry more than one, none of them function.
  • You gain a +1 item bonus to the damage rolls of lightning powers and thunder powers. Level 17: +2 item bonus. Level 27: +3 item bonus.
